attributes.title: It almost killed me
attributes.review: When I was downloading the app 10 hitman tried to come kill me but I fought them off with my pro gamer skills it also killed my dog in the process WORST APP EVER

Went on the app and almost instantly got swarmed by Karen’s not wearing mask asking if I wanted a pumpkin spice latte, luckily for me I won’t have to drink one because natural selection will get to them before then.

this app has caused my family the most horrible pain. We have been deported even though we are from America 🥳.
